subtitle: Be sure not to stir the caramel mixture while it's cooking.

method.text: Cut the apples in half. Remove cores and cut each half into thick slices. Toss in the lemon juice to help prevent discolouration and draining off any excess juice.

Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the cinnamon and apple slices. Scatter over the caster sugar and saute together for 3-5 min stirring frequently or until softened slightly. Remove from the heat.
Arrange the apple slices in one large or individual dishes. Drizzle over any remaining melted butter.
Place the remaining granulated sugar in a heavy based saucepan with the water and heat very gently WITHOUT stirring for 2-3 min or until sugar has dissolved.
Bring to the boil then boil WITHOUT stirring for 3-5 min or until it begins to turn pale brown and caramelises - do keep watch over the sugar mixture as it can burn very easily.
Remove from the heat and very quickly drizzle the caramel over the apples. Leave to set in a cool place but not the fridge.

title: Cheats apple brulee
